title: Fruity fruit cake
ingredients: ['130g dried apricots', '250ml water', '175g butter', '200g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '150g golden raisins', '450g red and green glace cherries', '6 rings crystallised pineapple', '450g crystallised mixed fruit', '250g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125ml apricot juice', '115g chopped pecans']
